Referrer Policy is set to 'unsafe-url'

Check that all sub-resources get the stripped referrer URL.

The referrer URL is stripped-referrer when a document served over http requires an https sub-resource via fetch-request using the http-csp delivery method and when the target request is cross-origin.

See specification details for this test.

Scenario outline

Delivery method http-csp
Origin transition cross-origin
Protocol transition from http to https
Subresource type fetch-request
Expected result Referrer URL should be stripped-referrer
